message:
Title: "In the Valley of Ballots"

Under moon's veil, Spring bares wounded: a hollow dance of democracy. In frost and fire, crows attest, neither land nor liberty possess their ballot. Yet, life pulses in Ukrainian soil, aspiring for sunrays, for victory: a daring bloom betwixt the cracks.
prompt: Russia-Ukraine war at a glance: what we know on day 655 Ukraine condemned Russian plans to hold presidential elections next spring on occupied territory, declaring them “null and void” and pledging to prosecute any observers sent to monitor them. Russia’s upper house set the country’s presidential election this week for next March, and chair Valentina Matviyenko said residents in four occupied Ukrainian regions would be able to vote for the first time. Ukraine’s foreign ministry
